events.name: STAR WARS | Lightsaber Making for Children: Sith or Jedi?
events.description:
LIMITED SPACES. Can you feel the Force within you? Are you the Last Jedi? Click 'Interested' to stay updated and secure your Lightsaber soon: http://lightsaber09dec.peatix.com/

Join Din Chan from Madlab in completing your Jedi journey. Learn about electronics and soldering to construct your very own lightsaber.

Recommended for children aged 9 years and above. Youth and adult learners are welcomed. No prior experience needed.


Trainer profile:

Artist Din Chan is known to use science and technology in his art work. 
His work is based on interaction of the audience through movement and their senses.
He use everyday item to create his work from a pencil that sings, painting with lights and a musical weighing scale.

He hopes that his artwork shows how technology can be applied creatively and is not as intimidating and can be fun when applied.

Secure your Lightsaber soon: http://lightsaber09dec.peatix.com/
events.location: MOX, Katong Point, 451 Joo Chiat Rd, Singapore 427664
